description: The package contains a command line version of F# Formatting libraries, which can be used for literate programming with F# (great for building documentation) and for generating library documentation from inline code comments. The key componments are Markdown parser, tools for formatting F# code snippets, including tool tip type information and a tool for generating documentation from library metadata.
releaseNotes:
- Be compatible with the common-mark spec for 'Fenced code blocks' and 'Indented code blocks'.
See https://github.com/tpetricek/FSharp.Formatting/pull/343.
Please follow-up by adding support for more sections of the spec!
Just add the section to https://github.com/tpetricek/FSharp.Formatting/blob/master/tests/FSharp.Markdown.Tests/CommonMarkSpecTest.fs#L20
and fix the newly enabled tests.
- Add ComiledName to members with F# specific naming (https://github.com/tpetricek/FSharp.Formatting/pull/372)
summary: A command line tool for building great F# documentation, samples and blogs
